column4: If I wanted to start being an activist  in the sense of getting Game publishers to try releasing linux binaries for games, where should I start?
Game publishers publish where the money is.  TO get more linux games, buy linux games.
any idea what linux games there are?
do you like it?
I only use it when I need it, i.e. I broke the gui or I'm on a server.  for that it works skippily.
Thanks :) aptting it now ^_^
in text mode, yes.... or shutdown now -r
so if I were to hit that in a terminal in gnome.. it would shutdown my computer?
terminal != text mode interface.
what is the correct name of something ,ike what is at ctrl alt f1?
End of File.  it will close a terminal session if you have one open.
good way to end a cat command to right?
only way that I know. :D
